Description: The Holy Family; Virgin seated in centre, Child standing on her left knee, infant St John the Baptist standing r, with classical plinth, trees and pyramid, in an oval. 1723 Pen and brown ink, with grey wash Verso: Landscape with the Flight into Egypt; lake, mountains, and fortress, with Holy Family in foreground Pen and brown ink
Bibliographic references: Croft-Murray (unpublished) / Catalogue of British Drawings in the British Museum: artists born 1665 to 1715 (2)
Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (1)
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
